[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [nullableNumberConverter](../fast-element.nullablenumberconverter/index.html)

## nullableNumberConverter variable

A [ValueConverter](../fast-element.valueconverter/) that converts to and from `number` values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nullableNumberConverter: ValueConverter
```

## Remarks

This converter allows for nullable numbers, returning `null` if the input was `null`<!-- -->, `undefined`<!-- -->, or `NaN`<!-- -->.
